TStatistic Struct Reference
[Class Statistic container]

A container for the statistical values. More...

#include <kernel_statistic.h>


Data Fields

double Min
double Max
double Mean
double StdDev
unsigned int SizeOfHistogram
UINT32 * pHistogram

Detailed Description

A container for the statistical values.

More statistical values may be added in later versions.

Definition at line 46 of file kernel_statistic.h.

Parameters:

UINT32* TStatistic::pHistogram
 

Parameters:
pHistogram  Array of long integers containing the histogram. Indexing is from pHistogram[Min] to pHistogram[Max].

Definition at line 61 of file kernel_statistic.h.

Referenced by k_DeriveImageStats(), k_DeriveIntImageStats(), k_DrawHistogram(), k_EmptyStatistic(), and k_InitStatistic().

unsigned int TStatistic::SizeOfHistogram
 

Parameters:
SizeOfHistogram  Size of the histogram array found in pHistogram. Note: Not all functions derives a histogram due to the nature of some value types, such as FLOAT32.
